ComicInfo.Title: Man in the Hood; The Lost Race; The Man Germ; The Things; Hydra the Immortal Monster
ComicInfo.Series: Starhenge Book One: The Dragon and the Boar
ComicInfo.Summary: MINISERIES FINALE In the shocking conclusion of STARHENGE: BOOK ONE, King Arthur is killed after Gwynn sabotages Merlin's plans. Merlin goes mad and flees, transforming into an Elk. Can Taliesin, Amber, and Daryl offer any hope for the future of magic?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-14 09:58:49. [CVDB960569]
ComicInfo.Writer: Bob Powell, Howard Nostrand, Nat Barnett, Liam Sharp
ComicInfo.Penciller: Abe Simon, Al Avison, Bob Powell, Howard Nostrand, Moe Marcus, Liam Sharp, Matylda McCormack-Sharp
ComicInfo.Inker: Al Avison, Howard Nostrand, Liam Sharp, Matylda McCormack-Sharp
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Ben Wolstenholme, Dave Kendall, Liam Sharp, Sam Shearon
